snippet: Recent unrelated episodes — a student shot and 30 officers massacred — highlight the shortcomings of a force marred by corruption allegations and a reputation of menace.
abstract: Unrelated episodes in Kenya of an unwarranted police shooting of student and 30 officers being massacred highlight shortcomings of police force consistently rated as one of most corrupt public institutions in East Africa.
lead_paragraph: Recent unrelated episodes — a student shot and 30 officers massacred — highlight the shortcomings of a force marred by corruption allegations and a reputation of menace.

headline.seo: Killing of Student Further Sullies Kenyan Police
headline.main: Police Killing in Kenya Deepens Aura of Menace
headline.print_headline: Police Killing in Kenya Deepens Aura of Menace

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
